sources.title: Simbad contro i sette saraceni
sources.description: Title: Simbad contro i sette saraceni Summary: A rebel leader returns to his city for a final confrontation with the evil king he is fighting. However, he finds himself attracted to the king's beautiful niece. Directed by: Emimmo Salvi Actors: Gordon Mitchell, Bruno Piergentili, Bella Cortez Production Company: Avis Film Release Date: 18 December 1964 (Italy) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 A rebel leader returns to his city for a final confrontation with the evil king he is fighting. However, he finds himself attracted to the king's beautiful niece.
